Boss of Scrapper level Pit #8.
[[Spirit of Water|Next #9]].
sounds: When the dust settles there will only be one.
name: Spirit of Earth
strategy:
To all vocations: try to keep diagonal to take less damage.
Druid or Sorcerer: Run around using [[Ice Strike]] and a wand/rod possibly shooting [[icicle]] and [[SD]]s.
Knight: Melee and [[Exori]].
Paladin: If you are fast enough try to run from him while shooting and using [[Ethereal Spear]].
